We’re listing three new ERC-20 tokens: ANT, GODS and RAD
We continue our month of impressive new asset listings with ANT, GODS and RAD.

We’re listing the following ERC-20 tokens globally (excluding the U.S. and Singapore):

  • ANT – a native governance token of Aragon, a DAO deployment platform.
  • GODS – a utility token of the Gods Unchained, a play to earn digital card game.
  • RAD – a native governance token for Radicle, a protocol for decentralized software collaboration.

Here's the listing schedule:

1. Transfer-only mode:

  • ANT, GODS, RAD: Friday, April 22

Deposits and withdrawals open but trading is not enabled yet.

2. Post-only mode:

  • ANT, GODS, RAD: Thursday, April 28, at 8:00 AM UTC

You’ll be able to place and cancel limit orders, but they’ll not be matched. Therefore, no orders will be completed during this stage.

3. Limit - only mode:

  • GODS, RAD: Thursday, April 28, at 12:00 AM UTC
  • ANT: Friday, April 29, at 9:00 AM UTC

Limit orders will be matched.

4. Full trading:

Once the order books gather sufficient liquidity, we’ll enable all order types and card purchases for the new trading pairs as well.

Follow us on Twitter for real-time updates on the rollout of the new trading pairs.

Here’s a full list of new trading pairs to be added at Bitstamp:

  • ANT/EUR
  • ANT/USD
  • GODS/EUR
  • GODS/USD
  • RAD/EUR
  • RAD/USD

ANT

ANT is a native governance token of Aragon, a DAO deployment platform that enables free organization and collaboration without intermediaries. Each ANT token entails an opportunity for governance participation, since by holding ANT, users acquire voting rights for future development of the Aragon ecosystem and other DAOs within it.

GODS

GODS is a utility token of the Gods Unchained, a play to earn digital card game powered by blockchain. As a premium currency within the broader Gods Unchained space, it is distributed as a reward to players and can be used for NFT minting, marketplace participation or in-game purchases.

RAD

RAD is a native governance token for Radicle, a protocol for decentralized software collaboration. It enables communal ownership, collective governance and unlocks long-term sustainability of the Radicle network. By holding RAD users can avoid fees when interacting with Ethereum-based protocols and maintain governing privileges over all Ethereum-based smart contracts and Radicle Treasury.

And that’s all for now! If you want to get in on the action, head over to our website and start trading – there are already over 130 trading pairs lined up!
